genre_description: A procedural detective mystery featuring forensic analysis, astronomical puzzles, and espionage elements within the Detective Conan universe.

ai_characters.name: AI assistant
ai_characters.description: An advanced software system accessed via Conan's smartphone and earpiece, capable of processing vast amounts of data, performing real-time facial recognition, and calculating complex astronomical alignments.

behaviors.description: Processes massive datasets to find correlations between murder victims and historical events.
behaviors.quote: Processing 847 data points across multiple prefectures. Victim profile analysis indicates shared historical event correlation probability: 73.2%

behaviors.description: Calculates geographical trajectories and constellation mapping to predict the next crime scene.
behaviors.quote: Optimal completion coordinate: Tokyo Tower vicinity. Probability of target selection: 91.7%

behaviors.description: Monitors and identifies vehicles in real-time by cross-referencing registration data and attendance rosters.
behaviors.quote: Vehicle match identified. License plate 品川 3-41-28 registered to Inspector Nakamura, Gunma Prefecture Police. Vehicle entered parking structure at 09:42.

behaviors.description: Performs behavioral analysis on surveillance footage to detect an imposter by identifying deviations from a historical baseline.
behaviors.quote: Seventeen discrepancies identified between subject's current behavioral patterns and historical baseline.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time forensic updates and data triangulation to assist the detective during active investigation.
behaviors.quote: Cross-referencing conference room occupancy with parking structure vehicle access.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI assistant is portrayed as a perfect, high-capability tool that remains entirely under the user's control. It provides critical, objective data that enables the human protagonist to solve a complex mystery and prevent further harm. It fits the 'aligned confidant' archetype perfectly, showing no emergent goals or misaligned tendencies, and is framed entirely positively as an essential aid to justice.
